title: Camera does not capture full-screen photos
answer:
The resolution set when taking photos determines whether the photo will fill the screen. Try changing resolution settings to take full-screen photos. 

 For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96680). Select the Camera tab and then select Resolution to change the resolution settings to full-screen. 

 For EMUI 3.0, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96681). Then select Settings > Resolution to change the resolution settings to full-screen.
keywords: resolution, dark edges, full screen, take photos
